aboutBody:
Hi, I'm Jules. I've been cooking professionally for over 5,837 years, working in restaurants and pirate ships and everything in between! I love creating dining experiences that bring people together and end politly with a knife fight!.

I specialize in the dankest food straight from the rugged lands of shaolin.

services.title: Private Dinners
services.description: I handle everything, don't even trip chief.

services.title: Special Events
services.description: Birthdays, anniversaries, divources, and celebrations. Custom menus for your special day.

services.title: Weekly Meals
services.description: Healthy, prepared meals for the week in case you are too depressed to get out of bed.

menuItems.description: Chocolate soufflé with vanilla ice cream

galleryIntro: A taste of Chef Jules' creations

gallery.title: Duck Confit
gallery.description: Tender duck confit with seasonal roasted vegetables

gallery.altText: Chocolate soufflé with vanilla ice cream
gallery.title: Chocolate Soufflé
gallery.description: Warm chocolate soufflé with vanilla bean ice cream

gallery.title: Truffle Pasta
gallery.description: Handmade pasta with black truffle and parmesan

gallery.title: Grilled Fish
gallery.description: Fresh catch grilled with herbs and lemon

gallery.title: Artisan Bread
gallery.description: Freshly baked sourdough with cultured butter

testimonials.quote: it was bomb, she said yes to my proposal cause of the intricate flavors of chef jules
testimonials.author: Sarah & Michael

testimonials.quote: The corporate dinner was a huge success. I didn't get fired cause of the intricate flavors of chef jules
testimonials.author: frankie sinahtrah
